channel.title: Behavioural Patterns on COMP2511 Musings
channel.description: Recent content in Behavioural Patterns on COMP2511 Musings

item.title: Visitor Pattern
item.description: Adds new operations and behaviours to existing objects without modifying them.

item.title: Template Method Pattern
item.description: The Template Method pattern aims to encapsulate the “things that vary”, whilst outlining a common procedure.

item.title: Iterator Pattern
item.description: The iterator pattern provides a way to access the elements of an aggregate object, without needing to know its underlying mechanism

item.title: Observer Pattern
item.description: Event-Driven Programming An order-of-execution independent system (independent of time).

item.title: State Pattern
item.description: The same input can produce a different output, depending on the context/current state of the machine .

item.title: Strategy Pattern
item.description: The strategy method performs different functionality depending on its provided internals.
